statements: SELECT * FROM machines
SELECT machine_name, cpu_usage FROM machines WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT * FROM machines ORDER BY machine_name DESC
SELECT machine_name, memory_usage FROM machines WHERE disk_usage > 50
SELECT machine_id, status FROM machines ORDER BY cpu_usage
SELECT * FROM machines WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, cpu_usage FROM machines WHERE memory_usage > 50;
SELECT machine_name, disk_usage FROM machines WHERE cpu_usage < 30 ORDER BY disk_usage DESC;
SELECT machine_name, status FROM machines WHERE cpu_usage >= 80 AND memory_usage <= 40 ORDER BY memory_usage ASC;
SELECT AVG(cpu_usage) AS avg_cpu_usage, AVG(memory_usage) AS avg_memory_usage FROM machines;
SELECT * FROM machines ORDER BY machine_name ASC;
SELECT machine_name, ip_address, location FROM machines WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT id, location FROM machines WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY cpu_usage DESC;
SELECT machine_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM performance_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM machines WHERE location = 'Data Center A';
SELECT machine_name, status FROM machines WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY machine_name DESC;
SELECT machine_name, ip_address FROM machines WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND status = 'Inactive';
SELECT machine_name, ip_address, location FROM machines WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT machine_name, location FROM machines JOIN performance_metrics ON machines.id = performance_metrics.machine_id WHERE performance_metrics.cpu_usage > 80;
SELECT * FROM machines;
SELECT machine_name, location FROM machines ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, metric_type, metric_value FROM metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT machine_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM metrics GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT * FROM machines WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY machine_name DESC;
SELECT machine_name, ip_address FROM machines JOIN metrics ON machines.id = metrics.machine_id WHERE metric_type = 'temperature' AND metric_value > 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT m.machine_name, u.username FROM machines m JOIN users u ON m.id = u.id WHERE u.role = 'admin' AND m.location <> 'California';
SELECT machine_name, SUM(metric_value) AS total_value FROM machines JOIN metrics ON machines.id = metrics.machine_id GROUP BY machine_name HAVING total_value > 1000;
SELECT m.machine_name, COUNT(*) AS metric_count FROM machines m JOIN metrics ON m.id = metrics.machine_id WHERE metric_value < 0 GROUP BY m.machine_name ORDER BY metric_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM machines;
SELECT machine_name, ip_address FROM machines WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(*) FROM metrics GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT machine_name, last_checkin FROM machines ORDER BY last_checkin DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM machines;
SELECT machine_name, ip_address FROM machines WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT machine_name, ip_address, last_checkin FROM machines ORDER BY last_checkin DESC;
SELECT * FROM metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 AND timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT users.username, machines.machine_name FROM users JOIN user_access ON users.user_id = user_access.user_id JOIN machines ON user_access.machine_id = machines.machine_id;
SELECT * FROM machines;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name FROM machines WHERE machine_type='Server';
SELECT machine_id, location FROM machines WHERE machine_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(*) FROM alerts GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT * FROM machines WHERE machine_type = 'server' ORDER BY machine_id DESC;
SELECT machine_name, location FROM machines WHERE machine_type = 'switch' AND location = 'Data Center A';
SELECT user_name, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT log_id, message, severity FROM logs WHERE severity = 'error' AND machine_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(metric_id) AS metric_count FROM metrics GROUP BY machine_id ORDER BY metric_count DESC;
